nderdark

Location - Githyanki Creche, Classroom , Youth Varrl (trainee being beaten, northern-most room)

Location - Moonrise Towers, upper floor in locked room

How to unlock Discover the History of Prince Orpheus

Read the Gith plate found in the Arcane Tower, located in the Underdark. It can be found in the third-story room, accessible only after restoring power to the tower. Read the Gith plate found in the Gith Creche. In the Classroom, if you help Youth Varrl, he will reward you with Part
